title: 服务器一进地皮就卡，好像是拔刀崩溃的，有错误报告
author: LittleWen
txt_content:
26.07 13:03:11 [服务器] 警告 Cauldron has removed EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/504, l='plotworld', x=-Infinity, y=-Infinity, z=Infinity] to prevent a server crash.26.07 13:03:11 [服务器] 警告 Entity is at -Infinity,Infinity (chunk 2147483647,2147483647) but was stored in chunk -7,526.07 13:03:11 [服务器] 警告 Wrong location for EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/504, l='plotworld', x=-Infinity, y=-Infinity, z=Infinity] in world 'plotworld'!
错误报告

replies.author: a1016746326
replies.txt_content:
服务器到底是崩溃还是无限卡死？崩溃就是直接关服重启了，卡死则是玩家能说话，但做不了任何事，过段时间全部集体掉线。
试试timings指令检测问题
